00028 #ifndef __D3D11DEVICE_H__
00029 #define __D3D11DEVICE_H__
00030 
00031 
00032 #include "OgreD3D11Prerequisites.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre
00035 {
00036     class D3D11Device
00037     {
00038     private:
00039         ID3D11Device * mD3D11Device;
00040         ID3D11DeviceContext * mImmediateContext;
00041         ID3D11InfoQueue * mInfoQueue; 
00042 
00043         struct ThreadInfo
00044         {
00045             ID3D11DeviceContext* mContext;
00046             void* mEventHandle;
00047 
00048             ThreadInfo(ID3D11DeviceContext* context)
00049                 : mContext(context)
00050                 , mEventHandle(0)
00051             {
00052                 mEventHandle = CreateEvent(0, false, false, "ThreadContextEvent");
00053             }
00054 
00055             ~ThreadInfo()
00056             {
00057                 mContext->Release();
00058                 mContext = 0;
00059 
00060                 CloseHandle(mEventHandle);
00061             }
00062         };
00063 
00064         D3D11Device();
00065     public:
00066 
00067 
00068         D3D11Device(ID3D11Device * device);
00069 
00070         ~D3D11Device();
00071 
00072         inline ID3D11DeviceContext * GetImmediateContext()
00073         {
00074             return mImmediateContext;
00075         }
00076         
00077         inline ID3D11Device * operator->() const
00078         {
00079             assert(mD3D11Device); 
00080             if (D3D_NO_EXCEPTION != mExceptionsErrorLevel)
00081             {
00082                 clearStoredErrorMessages();
00083             }
00084             return mD3D11Device;
00085         }
00086 
00087         const void clearStoredErrorMessages(  ) const;
00088 
00089         ID3D11Device * operator=(ID3D11Device * device);
00090         const bool isNull();
00091         const String getErrorDescription(const HRESULT hr = NO_ERROR) const;
00092 
00093         inline const bool isError(  ) const
00094         {
00095             if (D3D_NO_EXCEPTION == mExceptionsErrorLevel)
00096             {
00097                 return  false;
00098             }
00099 
00100             return _getErrorsFromQueue();
00101         }
00102 
00103         const bool _getErrorsFromQueue() const;
00104         void release();
00105         ID3D11Device * get();
00106 
00107         enum eExceptionsErrorLevel
00108         {
00109             D3D_NO_EXCEPTION,
00110             D3D_CORRUPTION,
00111             D3D_ERROR,
00112             D3D_WARNING,
00113             D3D_INFO,
00114         };
00115 
00116         static eExceptionsErrorLevel mExceptionsErrorLevel;
00117         static void setExceptionsErrorLevel(const eExceptionsErrorLevel exceptionsErrorLevel);
00118         static const eExceptionsErrorLevel getExceptionsErrorLevel();
00119 
00120 
00121     };
00122 }
